popt4jlib.MSSC

Class ClustererTerminationNoCenterMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.MSSC.ClustererTerminationNoCenterMove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClustererTerminationIntf

    public class ClustererTerminationNoCenterMove
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClustererTerminationIntf
    specifies that a clustering process must stop when two successive calls of isDone() the centers found by the associated clusterer have not moved at all.

    Note:

    • 20181105: added one-arg constructor to allow for the centers to move slightly from their previous position, and still satisfy the criteria for "no movement".

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2018

    Company:

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      private int _totIters 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClustererTerminationNoCenterMove()
      no-arg constructor retains the default radius of centers that are allowed to move and still be considered as no-move, 1E-7.
      ClustererTerminationNoCenterMove(double c)
      constructor sets the distance allowed for centers to move from iteration to iteration and still be considered as no-move.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isDone()
      return true only when the ClustererIntf object that has registered with this object, satisfies the criterion specified by this object.
      void registerClustering(ClustererIntf cl)
      register with a specific clusterer (implementing the ClustererIntf).

    • Method Detail

      • registerClustering

        public void registerClustering(ClustererIntf cl)
        Description copied from interface: ClustererTerminationIntf
        register with a specific clusterer (implementing the ClustererIntf). The clusterVectors() method of the clusterer must then check with this object's isDone() method to see whether the clustering process can stop.
        Specified by:
        registerClustering in interface ClustererTerminationIntf
        Parameters:
        cl - ClustererIntf

        Description copied from interface: ClustererTerminationIntf

        Returns:
